resources.string: Designed for simplicity and reliability, this app is your companion for managing food allergies effortlessly!
• Personalised allergen alerts.\n• Barcode and ingredient label scanning.\n• Clear safety alerts and product history.
• Personal details (name, email, allergens) for your profile.\n• Product scan data (barcode and OCR) for allergen detection.
• To provide personalised allergen alerts and improve the app experience.\n• We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
• You can view, update, or delete your data anytime.
• Your data is securely stored and protected.
If you have any questions, contact us at enquiry@fad.com

The Food Allergen Detection App helps you shop safely by identifying allergens in food products. With barcode scanning, OCR technology, and a personalised allergen profile, the app makes it easy to check if a product is safe for you.
INGREDIENTS: Pork, water, wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), onion, rapeseed oil, parsley, sage, thyme, salt, yeast extract, black pepper, onion powder.
